title: Preview Pane
extract: Preview Pane - Turn On or Off. You can use the preview pane in Windows Explorer to see the contents of most files. If you select an e‑mail message, text file, picture, or video for example, you can see a preview of its contents without opening it in a program. The preview pane is turned off by default in Windows 7.Feb 6, 2010
extract_html: Preview Pane - Turn On or Off. You can use the preview pane in Windows Explorer to see the contents of most files.
